entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this morning then cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning and developing this afternoon. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate.
